channel.title: [PI] Custom Login Interface (Will rep++)
channel.description:
I want to make an interface for after you log in. It's gonna pop up and say some info about the server, tell them to vote, donate, etc. I can't find any interface makers for PI. I can't find any good guides, if you know of any please link me. Otherwise could you explain how I would hard code one. Thank you. :P Will repp+
I use PI
P.S. I'm speaking of one that covers the whole area gameplay area. Not a simple small message box that floats in above the chatbox.
